name: Marijke de Goey
biography: Marijke de Goey is a sculptor and jewlery designer. She studied at the Rietveld Academy, Amsterdam (1974-79). She gives lectures, seminars and workshops at different universities in Europe and Asia. De Goey has designed public sculptural projects in major cities around the world including Auckland, Amsterdam, Rotterdam, London, and many others. She has exhibited widely as well.
